title: Artistic Studio Loft with Balcony in Ustka’s Hidden Port Gem
description: Bask in inspiration within this bright, impeccably presented studio loft in Ustka’s sought-after Port District. This thoughtfully designed 32 sqm studio features a spacious living/sleeping zone that opens onto a private balcony—perfect for creative mornings or tranquil sunsets. Enjoy an inviting kitchen, a sleek modern bathroom, and immediate access to tastefully tended common areas that reflect the refreshing sea-breeze spirit. Residents relish summer dips in the included swimming pool, making every day feel like a getaway.
neighborhood_description: Embrace life nestled near Ustka’s revitalized business district, mere steps from a vibrant maze of cozy cafés, seafood bistros, and unique local retail. With direct access to serene bike lines and the nearby highway, you find the perfect balance between peaceful coastal charm and urban convenience—ideal for short or long-term rentals. The Port District’s stroll-worthy lanes pulse with seaside energy and authenticity, drawing visitors keen to enjoy both commerce and relaxation.
